alert.note: Alert for Owyhee Mountains (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued March 09 at 3:15AM MST until March 10 at 8:00PM MST by NWS Boise
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 8 PM MST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 7 inches, except 7 to 14 inches over the mountains. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...Owyhee Mountains zone. * WHEN...From 5 PM this afternoon to 8 PM MST Friday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility and drift on roadways. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
